text: The flag of Cuautitlán de García Barragán () It is colored blue and yellow and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of three diagonal stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the state flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code Dark blue #00008B Yellow #F1BF00 ==References== Cuautitlán Category:Symbols of Jalisco
title: Flag of Cuautitlán de García Barragán
